PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter (W)hs/Prod,(S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid option H W,S,D WAREHOUSE,SUMMARY,DETAIL
Enter Warehouse No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 4 R Enter Warehouse # or (ALL)
Enter Product No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 15 R
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
